text: The Angels are an American girl group who had most of the popularity in the 1960s. Their song My Boyfriend's Back hit #1 in 1963, although the band has had many other songs. == Members == * Barbara Allbut Brown * Phyllis Allbut Sirico * Peggy Santiglia Ricker * Bernadette Carroll == Albums == * ...And the Angels Sing (1962) * My Boyfriendâ€™s Back (1963) * A Halo to You (1964) * Love, The Angels (2008) Category:American girl groups Category:American pop music groups Category:1960s American music groups
title: The Angels
